field.name: summary
field.value: Make ProjectionQuery<ARType, TResultItem> able to return simple types

field.name: description
field.value:
In the ProjectionQuery class I'm unable to return arrays of eg. strings.
A features comparable to the following HQL would be very nice:
select distinct u.Name from User u where u.Address in (:addresses)
Apparently a SimpleQuery<string>(typeof(ARType)...) is able to do the trick, but not the ProjectionQuery - I always get an exception telling me that there's no constructor for System.String.

comment.author: mzywitza
comment.text: This is exactly what SimpleQuery is for. If you need to use a ProjectionQuery, you have to create a class taking a string as constructor argument.
